features.featureTitle: Fix the Internet Identity authentication flow in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts (read-only) and any surrounding integration code so that login works correctly across all major browsers (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox). If the hook itself cannot be modified (immutable path), create a wrapper or patch the integration layer in useActor.ts or App.tsx to resolve the compatibility gap.
